mapper.select: SELECT CATEGORY_ID, NAME, KIND, default_pat_id, with_case, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME FROM V_CATEGORY WHERE DELETE_FLG = 0 AND CATEGORY_ID = #{category_id};
SELECT CATEGORY_ID, NAME, KIND, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME FROM V_CATEGORY WHERE DELETE_FLG = 0 ORDER BY KIND, CATEGORY_ID;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CATEGORY (NAME, KIND, default_pat_id, with_case, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME) VALUES (#{name}, #{kind}, #{default_pat_id}, #{with_case}, #{updated_by}, current_timestamp);
mapper.update: UPDATE CATEGORY SET NAME = #{name}, KIND = #{kind}, default_pat_id = #{default_pat_id}, with_case = #{with_case}, UPDATED_BY = #{updated_by}, UPDATED_TIME = current_timestamp WHERE CATEGORY_ID = #{category_id};
UPDATE CATEGORY SET DELETE_FLG = 1, UPDATED_BY = #{updated_by}, UPDATED_TIME = current_timestamp WHERE CATEGORY_ID = #{category_id};
